name: Vanguard's Coordinated Tactics
title: Chevreuse: Vanguard's Coordinated Tactics
desc: "The Special Security and Surveillance Patrol deals with a whole host of heinous crimes and dangerous criminals. As such, the methods we employ to enforce the law can be a bit on the... harsher side."
in_play_description: When Chevreuse, who has this card equipped, is in play, and after opposing characters take Overloaded reaction DMG: Your next 2 instances of Pyro DMG or Electro DMG dealt +1. (Including Pyro DMG or Electro DMG dealt through Swirl reactions)

attributes.source: Reward for inviting Chevreuse to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

skills.desc:
You can only play this card if your party consists of only Pyro and Electro characters: Equip this card to Chevreuse.
When Chevreuse, who has this card equipped, is in play, and after opposing characters take Overloaded reaction DMG: Your next 2 instances of Pyro DMG or Electro DMG dealt +1. (Including Pyro DMG or Electro DMG dealt through Swirl reactions)
